mapper.select: select cdyt.status, count(*) totalCount from cor_delivery_trace cdyt where cdyt.dr = 0 and cdyt.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and cdyt.user_id = #{userId} and cdyt.status in ('3','5','6','7') group by cdyt.status

select DATE_FORMAT(updated_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as times, ifnull(sum(case when cdy.status = '3' then 1 end), 0) as rejected, ifnull(sum(case when cdy.status = '5' then 1 end), 0) as timeoutComplete, ifnull(sum(case when cdy.status = '6' then 1 end), 0) as completed, ifnull(sum(case when cdy.status = '7' then 1 end), 0) as cancel, ifnull(sum(case when cdy.status = '3' then 1 when cdy.status = '5' then 1 when cdy.status = '6' then 1 when cdy.status = '7' then 1 end), 0) as total from cor_delivery_trace cdy where cdy.dr = 0 and cdy.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and cdy.user_id = #{userId}
and (DATE_FORMAT(updated_time, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(SUBDATE(now(), INTERVAL 1 month), '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'))
and (DATE_FORMAT(updated_time, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(SUBDATE(#{dateTime} , INTERVAL 1 month),'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d'))
group by times
